item.title: Zangezi
item.description:
About
#

“Zangezi is a sextet accompanied by a â€œvisual artist” and a “sound designer” that strives for an artificial but organic sound production aesthetic." As the visual artist in this sextet, I composed the live-visuals in this piece along with camera support from Hoi Man. Much of the visuals were created with live-camera input along with elements made using footage filmed the day before during our rehearsals. In this work, the visuals mainly played with temporality and multiplicity of the image.

item.title: Rickey Mouse saga
item.description: RMFH was a project led by Finnish artist, Pasi MÃ¤kelÃ¤. I initially joined this constellation in the role of support camera and video editor during their first performance which was live streamed from Punctum (Prague, CZ) in December 2020. From the following year, I began creating the live-visuals we used in the show. Conceptually and formally rooted in experiment, this project was really fun to be a part of. I was able to come in and develop all the live-camera things I wanted to play with. I developed my practise of working with the simplicity of OBS Studio and pushing its limits by building visuals using chroma/luma keying, layering, collaging, multiple camera inputs and multiple projections.
